column4: Hi, installed apache2 php5 libapache2-mod-php5 and I did a2enmod php5 but when I view the webpage it parses the html ok but parses the php as text any ideas ?
have you restarted apache and cleared the cache in your browser?
yep
have you set the engine to "on" in /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini?
lemi check
yup it's on
does /etc/apache2/mods-enabled/php5.conf exist?
yep, I think it's an apache issue with addhandler
well the issue is that i can;t config apache :)
did you install apache from the repos?
the default conf files are usually fine...
ya just used apt-get
then a simple a2enmod _should_ work...
ya i tired a2enmod php5 no luck
and no errors in the php on the page?
it's only a problem when it's php in a html page, php info works fine if the extension is .php
by "php in a html page" do you mean a page with .html as a suffix?
yup
apache won't handle that by default
ah what shuld i do
easiest way is to change the .html suffix to .php
lol that worked thx
thxs heaps
np :)
